Title: Model View ViewModel AdventureWorks
Description: This is a sample starter kit for Visual Studio 2008, which exposes the pattern MVVM (Model View ViewModel) using WPF, C# 3.5 and Linq to SQL as the data repository.
HomeWiki:
Model View ViewModel AdventureWorks starter kit.

Author : Raffaeu (Raffaele Garofalo)
MCAD, MCSD, MCTS
Blog : http://blog.raffaeu.com

Description:

This project is a WPF Visual Studio 2008 solution that shows how to build a RIA application with WPF and Linq to SQL, using the common patterns like MVVM (Model View ViewModel) and more.
If you want to follow the complete tutorial you can go to my web site: http://blog.raffaeu.com.
If you need more information about the MVVM model, please go here: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dd419663.aspx

The pattern



Prerequisites:
  • Visual Studio 2008 SP1
  • SQL Server Express 2008
  • WPF basic design knowledge (Layout, Data binding, Template and Style)
